title: Smoke Jumpers
description: Watch the previously unfinished film by Verner Vollstedt about a team of firefighters battling the biggest fire of their lives.
quote: There are no more men to bring in.
altHero: lines of firemen walk up a hill toward a raging wildfire
alt1: firemen walk through a town on fire
alt2: the fireman look to the distance with buildings on fire in the background
alt4: Chase hanging from a tree by his parachute
